targetAudience: Drink 64-100oz water daily for 30 days. Perfect for chronic under-drinkers and those with low energy/focus.
scientificRationale: 75% of Americans are chronically dehydrated. Even mild dehydration (2% body weight) impairs cognitive function, mood, and physical performance. Research shows that adequate hydration improves energy, focus, skin quality, and digestion. By drinking 64-100oz daily for 30 days, you normalize hydration levels and experience compounding benefits. This is the simplest high-impact habit.
